alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 5:54AM EDT until March 31 at 6:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL JACKSON...BAY...NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN AND SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA... At 454 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles northeast of Marianna to near Panama City Beach, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Marianna, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Malone, Cottondale, Greenwood, Alford, Bascom, Moose Pond, Dirego Park, College Station, West Panama City, Camps Head and Bahama Beach. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
